extracted_playbook.title: Check Vulnerable Version
extracted_playbook.description: Use the Cisco tool to check if your version of Firepower Management Center (FMC) Software is vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running a vulnerable version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update to a fixed version of Cisco FMC software to mitigate the vulnerability.
